# Valid ISBN-10s:
# ---------------
123456789X
01 234 567 89
0 - 471 - 958 - 697
1-56619-909-3
0136091814
020-50 80 0--57- -

# Invalid ISBN-10s:
# -----------------
0123456780
0-471-958-698
123456789x
2-56619-909-3
1-56619-919-3
1-56169-909-3

# Valid ISBN-13s:
# ---------------
9780470059029
978-0-13-149505-0
978 0 471 48648 0
978-1-56619-909-4
978 - 3 - 16 - 148410 - 0
9780136091813

# Invalid ISBN-13s:
# -----------------
9780470059020
978-0-13-149505-1
978_0_471_48648_0
958-1-56619-909-4
978-1-56619-919-4
9780136901813
